description: This file defines a utility class 'ThunderUtils' that provides static methods to interact with a Thunder service. It includes methods to get the service state and to create a Thunder controller client, utilizing specific namespaces and external classes such as 'PluginHost::IShell' and 'WPEFramework::JSONRPC::LinkType'. The file contains include guards, macro definitions, and includes another utility header.

classes.name: ThunderUtils
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to interact with Thunder services, including retrieving service state and creating Thunder controller clients.

methods.name: uint32_t getServiceState(PluginHost::IShell * shell,const string & callsign,PluginHost::IShell::state & state)
methods.description: Checks the state of a Thunder service identified by callsign via the given shell interface.

methods.name: std::shared_ptr<WPEFramework::JSONRPC::LinkType<WPEFramework::Core::JSON::IElement>> getThunderControllerClient(std::string callsign="")
methods.description: Creates and returns a shared pointer to a Thunder controller client connection for the specified callsign.

ctags.name: getServiceState
ctags.pattern: /^    static uint32_t getServiceState(PluginHost::IShell* shell, const string& callsign, PluginHos/
